btv.download.tracker

Class HTTPTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • btv.download.tracker.Tracker
      • btv.download.tracker.HTTPTracker

  • public class HTTPTracker
extends Tracker
    This class represents a HTTP tracker. It can be used to create a query to send to a tracker, contact the tracker and return the Bdecoded response

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HTTPTracker(java.lang.String tracker, java.lang.String hash, java.lang.String peerID, java.lang.String port, java.lang.String downloaded, java.lang.String uploaded, java.lang.String left)
      This constructor takes a tracker address and various query values and sets up a query ready to send to the tracker.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map contact()
      Send a request to this tracker to get a bdecoded response

      • Methods inherited from class btv.download.tracker.Tracker

        getQueries, getTracker

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • HTTPTracker

        public HTTPTracker(java.lang.String tracker,
           java.lang.String hash,
           java.lang.String peerID,
           java.lang.String port,
           java.lang.String downloaded,
           java.lang.String uploaded,
           java.lang.String left)
        This constructor takes a tracker address and various query values and sets up a query ready to send to the tracker.
        Parameters:
        tracker - The tracker address.
        hash - The SHA1 hash of the info dictionary of the Torrent.
        peerID - The peer ID of the BitTorrent client.
        port - The port the BitTorrent client will use to listen for incoming peer connections
        downloaded - The number of bytes of this Torrent that have been downloaded already.
        uploaded - The number of bytes of this Torrent that we have uploaded already.
        left - The number of bytes of this Torrent that we have yet to download.

    • Method Detail

      • contact

        public java.util.Map contact()
                      throws BDecodingException
        Send a request to this tracker to get a bdecoded response
        Specified by:
        contact in class Tracker
        Returns:
        The Bdecoded tracker response in the form of a Map.
        Throws:
        BDecodingException - If the tracker response cannot be parsed.
